Text.Page: Pardon me, friend. Do you have a moment?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Absolutely."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Thank you. My bondmate was helping Princess Syona write her memoirs of the first Argon War.

He died not long ago, in the attack on Magthulk Crater. Many pages of his book were lost.

If you find any of them, will you return them to me?

This is all of them! Thank you, .

I'll send a copy of this to our son in Allemantheia. I'm sure he'll appreciate having a book his father wrote.

Please accept this copy and my gratitude.
Have you seen the missing pages? I fear they may be lost forever.
